alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 8:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central El Paso County through 845 PM MDT... At 825 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm with pea sized hail in Skyway Neighborhood in western Colorado Springs, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Colorado Springs and Manitou Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
